dataset_id: AMSR-E/AMSR2 Unified L2B Global Swath Surface Precipitation V001
title: AMSR-E/AMSR2 Unified L2B Global Swath Surface Precipitation V001
summary: This AMSR-E/AMSR2 Unified Level-2B data set provides instantaneous surface precipitation rate and type over land and ocean, and precipitation profiles over ocean. This global data set is generated using the Goddard Profiling Algorithm. Note: This product uses the Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA) AMSR2 Level-1R input brightness temperatures that are calibrated, or unified, across the JAXA AMSR-E and JAXA AMSR2 Level-1R products.
